keyMoments.title: Captain's Bounty Increases to 100 Million
keyMoments.description: Luffy's bounty is revealed to have increased to 100 million berries following the Arabasta incident.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's establishment as major threats in the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: First Mate Receives First Bounty
keyMoments.description: Zoro receives his first bounty of 60 million berries, the highest first bounty from the East Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Two crew members now have active bounties totaling 160 million berries.

keyMoments.title: Journey to Skypiea Begins
keyMoments.description: The crew successfully rides the Knock-Up Stream, beginning their journey to the legendary Sky Island.
keyMoments.significance: First crew in recent history to attempt reaching Skypiea via the Knock-Up Stream.

reveals.information: Total crew bounty reaches 160,000,000 berries with Luffy at 100 million and Zoro at 60 million

keyMoments.title: Pursuit of the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates pursue the Straw Hats to claim Luffy's 100 million berry bounty.
keyMoments.significance: First attempt at direct confrontation between the two crews.

keyMoments.title: Raft Destroyed by Knock-Up Stream
keyMoments.description: The crew's raft is completely destroyed by the force of the Knock-Up Stream, leaving them stranded in the ocean.
keyMoments.significance: Prevents the first major battle between Blackbeard and Luffy, postponing their inevitable confrontation.

keyMoments.title: Going Merry Wing Modifications
keyMoments.description: Masira and Shoujou complete modifications to the Going Merry, adding wings and enhancing flight capability for the Knock-Up Stream journey.
keyMoments.significance: Their work proves essential for the Straw Hats' successful ascent to Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Farewell to Cricket and Alliance
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats bid farewell to Cricket, Masira, and Shoujou as they prepare for the Knock-Up Stream journey.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the alliance formed during the Jaya Arc.
